item.description:
LATIN NIGHT!!

SINGLES WELCOME, and no partner required, plenty of Singles to dance with. All-levels class which starts at 7:15pm followed by a social dance from 8-11pm. Dance hosts & social mixers gets everyone up and dancing to Latin, Swing, Hustle & Contemporary music. Friendly, down-to-earth group of people dance, drink and socialize. The lounge area hosts a cash bar, coffee service and lite refreshments. Admission is $15pp which includes the lesson, dance & refreshments. No jeans or sneakers please.

$10 ADMISSION by mentioning MEETUP.com at the door!

Free ample parking, Air Conditioned, and large 3,000 sq ft dance floor!

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: LATIN DANCE LOUNGE
